name: Last Run: Loot Your Deck!
description:
“Last Run” is a prototype of a game in the genre of, let's call it, “deck looter card crawler”.

The action hero in the last and hottest action scene has to fight his way through crowds of armed enemies, shooting right and left and fighting back with whatever he can. He also has to rescue hostages and save museum treasures.

In short, there's no more time to explain, you have to run, shoot, and loot!
